entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
